name: FED 前端导航
title: 前端开发导航快速参考备忘单展示了前端的一些工具

cards.title: 简介
cards.body: 前端开发导航快速参考备忘单展示了前端的一些工具

cards.title: 社区
cards.body:
[CSDN](https://www.csdn.net/)
[GitHub](https://github.com/)
[InfoQ](http://www.infoq.com/cn)
[Medium](https://medium.com/topic/technology)
[SegmentFault](https://segmentfault.com/)

[稀土掘金](https://juejin.im/)

cards.title: JavaScript 工具
cards.body:
[Chrome Dev Tools](https://www.google.cn/chrome/)
[CoffeeScript](https://coffeescript.org/)
[Firefox Developer Tools](https://www.mozilla.org/zh-CN/firefox/new/)
[flow](https://flow.org/)
[TypeScript](https://www.typescriptlang.org/)

[JSDoc](https://jsdoc.app/)
[UglifyJS](http://lisperator.net/uglifyjs/transform)
[Prettier](https://prettier.io/)
[Biome - JS 语言格式化](https://prettier.io/)

cards.title: CSS 工具
cards.body:
[30秒CSS](https://www.30secondsofcode.org/css/)
[Autoprefixer](https://github.com/postcss/autoprefixer)
[ColorZilla](http://www.colorzilla.com/gradient-editor/)
[CSS Protips](https://github.com/AllThingsSmitty/css-protips)
[CSS3 Maker](http://www.css3maker.com/)
[CSSPIN](https://webkul.github.io/csspin/)
[CSSreference](https://cssreference.io/)
[CSSTree](https://github.com/csstree/csstree)
[CSS美化压缩](http://tool.css-js.com/)
[Easing Functions Cheat Sheet](http://easings.net/zh-cn)
[Emmet](https://www.emmet.io/)
[est](http://ecomfe.github.io/est/)
[Flex Layout Attribute](https://github.com/StefanKovac/flex-layout-attribute)
[minireset.css](http://lesscss.org/)
[Normalize.css](http://necolas.github.io/normalize.css/)
[PostCSS](http://postcss.org/)
[purifycss](https://github.com/purifycss/purifycss)
[Less](https://lesscss.org/)
[SASS](http://sass-lang.com/)
[Sprite Cow](http://www.spritecow.com/)
[Stylus](http://stylus-lang.com/)
[Stylelint](https://stylelint.io/)
